title: Piecing Together Mueller's Puzzle
description:
It has been another crazy week keeping track of the developments in Special Counsel Robert Mueller's investigation. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg White House reporter Shannon Pettypiece about the headlines made by two keys witnesses in the probe and what it means for Mueller's endgame. 
FOLLOW UP
 Shannon's latest report: What Cohen’s Plea Deal Means for Trump, His Business and Mueller
You can follow Shannon at: @spettypi 
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
